message: Let's split the money 70/30. It's a good deal for you in the first round, Bob. The value decreases much faster for you in further rounds!
I'm going for a slightly bigger share this time.  We both lose money each round, so let's make a deal that's more fair to us both.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. You're losing a lot of value each round. Take this deal while you still can!
